The Pretty Strands Scalp Renovator

Is a tool used to a stimulate and rebuild a new layer of skin that stimulates hair growth. This is a tool that’s great for people who are experiencing hair loss due to scalp trauma, products, hairstyling, and different forms of alopecia.

Is a tool used to a stimulate and rebuild a new layer of skin that stimulates hair growth. This is a tool that’s great for people who are experiencing hair loss due to scalp trauma, products, hairstyling, and different forms of alopecia.

What it does:

With the Pretty Strands scalp renovator the needles are pressed and rolled against the area. The needles slightly puncture the most outer layer of the skin which will cause minor surface wounds to the tissue. The body then works to produce the human growth hormone, new skin and hair. The nutrient rich Pretty Strands Oil is also applied to the area to assist with this process.

The study:

A team at the Department of Dermatology at L.T.M medical College and General Hospital in Sion, Mumbai, Maharashtra, India and published in the study 100 men who were currently using products for hair loss.
